'''Sandstone stairs''' are a [[sandstone]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Sandstone stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Sandstone Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Sandstone stairs generate as part of [[desert pyramid]]s, [[Village#Desert|desert village]]s, and warm [[ocean ruins]].
